jscover
=======

node wrap for [JSCover](http://tntim96.github.com/JSCover/).

* jscoverage: [94%](http://fengmk2.github.com/coverage/jscover.html)

## Install

```bash
$ npm install jscover -g
```

## Usage

Just like `jscoverage`

```bash
# jscoverage lib lib-cov
$ jscover lib lib-cov
```

## Authors

```bash
$ git summary

 project  : jscover
 repo age : 4 months
 active   : 9 days
 commits  : 30
 files    : 18
 authors  :
    30  fengmk2                 100.0%
```
